title: Rich Kids Stay Rich, Poor Kids Stay Poor FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: On Friday, a team of researchers led by Stanford economist Raj Chetty released a paper on how growing up in poverty affects boys and girls differently. Their core finding: Boys who grow up in poor families fare substantially worse in adulthood, in terms of employment and earnings, than girls who grow up in the same […]
